label: policyNumber
comment: Insurance policy number corresponding to this observation

label: cropSpeciesInfo
comment: Information of crops corresponding to this observation.

label: personnelInfo
comment: Personnel information of an individual or business corresponding to this observation.

label: landIdentityInfo
comment: The unique land identification information corresponding to this observation.

label: schemeInfo
comment: Farmer welfare schemes information corresponding to this observation.

label: insurancePremium
comment: The amount that is paid by the individual or business for availing the insurance policy.

label: localeInfo
comment: Locale information corresponding to this observation.

label: issualDate
comment: The date of issual of the insurance corresponding to this observation.

label: expiryDate
comment: The date of expiry of the insurance corresponding to this observation.

label: renewalDate
comment: The date of renewal of the insurance corresponding to this observation.

label: insuranceCoverage
comment: The maximum amount payable in the event of a claim by the policy holder for the insurance policy corresponding to this observation.

label: agencyName
comment: The agency which procures the commodity corresponding to this observation.

label: policyProtection
comment: The potential risk(s)/ event(s) that is (are) protected or insured against by the insurance policy corresponding to this observation. For eg., accidents, theft, fire, natural disasters, etc.

label: policyDate
comment: The date refers to the date on which the insurance policy itself becomes effective or starts providing coverage. It's the date from which the terms and conditions of the policy are applicable
